name: Taj Club House

reviews.text: We stayed there for one night. We have stayed at many taj. I would say this hotel is not the best one for holiday. I think if you are on business, this hotel is completely fine.
reviews.title: good business hotel

reviews.text: The location seems quite good.
reviews.title: The best Hotel in Chennai

reviews.text: I stayed at the Hotel in a interconnecting suite for one month and I have absolutly nothing negative to say about it!
reviews.title: business services are aweful

reviews.text: Nice modern big clean rooms with everything you need.
reviews.title: Outstanding service makes Taj Club House special and memorable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff is very serviceminded and friendly, helpfull in any task.
reviews.title: One of the best hotels I ever stayed in with excellent service

reviews.text: Considering the number of visits that everyone in the family makes to chettinad chennai, a usual this visit was also for a short one as it was a visit to the embassy. After the much talked about coramandel, it this one is classy and perfect for a business traveler. It is not so close to teh embassy compared to park, which is walk-able, but then fro the price, i think it worth every visit.
reviews.title: Mounted!!
Heart of City Location! " Club House " Name says it all :)
reviews.text: Since the hotel is new, it brings a fresh perspective to every business traveler in humid chennai, (coz i'm from blr) and nothing beats the bangalore weather.
I was super impressed with their business lunch of soups salads and desserts. You dont have to fill you're self up to catch up on a snooze if you are here for a meeting.
reviews.title: Great business hotel

reviews.text: The staff were great and gave me a late check out as well!!!
reviews.title: Top-notch service at the best Business hotel in Chennai

reviews.text: This Hotel is located in heart of Chennai City near Spencer's plaza , Mount road and is very new with decent ambience ! Price is bit expensive but worth it if you are on Business trip for 2 or 3 days ! Food is excellent and the Pub " Blend " is rocking awesome ! Dont feel shocked to see some Tamil Or Telugu Film Celebrities here during party nights
reviews.title: The Best Business Hotel in the city

reviews.text: Another feather on Taj Hotels Hat.
reviews.title: Excellent Service

reviews.text: I recently stayed in this property during my business visit to chennai. I loved their roof top restaurant with bar, it has an amazing view of the city.
reviews.title: Nice hotel with good food

reviews.text: The staffs are very friendly and caring. Kudos to Neha (Receptionist)...!
reviews.title: Outstanding hotel, outstanding staff, outstanding service.

reviews.text: Enjoyed the stay...!
reviews.title: great service

reviews.text: Visited the hotel a couple of times for team dinner and a business conference. The ambience is very good. The food is also great. The pub is pretty popular too!
reviews.title: Nothing impressive

reviews.text: My travel on November to India add more memories when I have visited one of my colleagues for lunch in Taj Club House. The hote by it self i can define it as VIBRANT. It has the special vibrant or pulling factors just for the best ambiance being a city hotel.
reviews.title: Vibrant Restaurant

reviews.text: The buffet line was superb. The food served was delicious. Special and variety of food was exclusivelu displayes and mouth watering. I have no words for the desserts... the only one words i can say is YUMMY and need more time to indulge yourself with all the special food there. Amazing and extra delicious....:-)
reviews.title: The most courteous and well trained staff ever encountered

reviews.text: The staff is just attentive and very helpful. Special mention to all the staff in Taj club House and you are are simply awesome.
reviews.title: Good stay option

reviews.text: Hope to be return soon with my family again and going to spend more nights in the VIBRANT place.
reviews.title: Very good business hotel

reviews.text: Simply amazing and excellent.
reviews.title: Most Modern Taj in Chennai

description: Located on Clubhouse Road – famous for its magnificent homes of British luminaries and as the original site of the renowned Madras Club.Taj Club House is a stylish contemporary hotel, with young and trendy food & beverage outlets & cutting edge technology. Taj Club House is the latest offering from Taj to Chennai, geared to meet the requirements of the "modern traveler" from offering ease of access to the modern fast paced world, to the comfort and style that the environs of the hotel offers.
